Getting started with mongolstats

Source: vignettes/getting-started.Rmd
getting-started.Rmd
library(mongolstats)
library(dplyr)

List tables and search 

itms <- nso_itms()
itms %>% select(tbl_id, tbl_eng_nm, strt_prd, end_prd) %>% head()

nso_itms_search("population") %>% select(tbl_id, tbl_eng_nm) %>% head()

Fetch data with labels 

dat <- nso_data(
  tbl_id = "DT_NSO_2600_004V1",
  period = c("201701","201702","201703"),
  code = c("1","2"),
  code1 = "101",
  labels = "en"
)

dat %>% select(tbl_id, period, code, code_en, value) %>% head()

Batch fetch 

reqs <- tibble::tibble(
  tbl_id = c("DT_NSO_0300_062V1","DT_NSO_0300_004V5"),
  period = "2016",
  code = c("12","181"),
  code1 = c("101","11")
)
nso_package(reqs, labels = "en") %>% select(tbl_id, period, value) %>% head()
